sentences.en: After the war many cities were full of rubble.
sentences.cn: 战后许多城市到处可见颓垣残壁.

sentences.en: All the buildings in the town have been reduced to rubble.
sentences.cn: 城里所有的建筑都成了废墟。

sentences.en: As the aeroplane went down the runway the wing touched a pile of rubble.
sentences.cn: 飞机降落沿跑道滑行的时候机翼擦到了一堆碎石。

sentences.en: Brick rubble is useful as the base for paths and patios.
sentences.cn: 碎砖石可以用来铺路基和庭院地基。

sentences.en: Entire suburbs have been reduced to rubble.
sentences.cn: 整个市郊都变成了一片废墟。

sentences.en: Fire-men were still clearing rubble from apartments damaged at the scene of the attack.
sentences.cn: 消防队员仍在从袭击现场遭到毁坏的公寓里往外清理瓦砾。

sentences.en: I moved away from the shack and picked my way among the rubble.
sentences.cn: 我离开木屋，小心地走在瓦砾间。

sentences.en: Michael pointed out to me that amongst the rubble, there was one building that remained untouched.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔指给我看说，瓦砾中有一栋建筑完好无损。

sentences.en: Rescue teams recovered more bodies from the rubble.
sentences.cn: 救援队从瓦砾中挖出了更多尸体。

sentences.en: Rescue workers are digging through the rubble in search of other victims.
sentences.cn: 救援人员正在废墟中挖掘，以搜寻其他受害者。

sentences.en: The building was reduced to a heap of rubble.
sentences.cn: 大楼变成了一片残垣断壁。

sentences.en: The fourteenth century cathedral was reduced to a mass of rubble.
sentences.cn: 这座14世纪的大教堂变成了一堆瓦砾。

sentences.en: The roof collapsed in a roar of rock and rubble.
sentences.cn: 屋顶轰隆一声塌了下来，碎石瓦砾落了一地。

sentences.en: Thousands of bodies are still buried under the rubble.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的尸体仍然被埋在碎石瓦砾下。

sentences.en: Whole blocks had been turned into smouldering rubble.
sentences.cn: 整座整座的街区都变成了一堆冒着青烟的瓦砾。

phrases.tran_cn: 毛石堆；毛石基；堆石斜坡堤

trans.tran_en: broken stones or bricks from a building or wall that has been destroyed
